description.english: Bacterial spot causes small, water-soaked, circular spots on leaves, stems, and fruits.
description.kiswahili: Madoa ya bakteria husababisha madoa madogo, yenye unyevunyevu kwenye majani, shina, na matunda.

english.other: Ensure proper crop rotation, avoid overhead watering, and space plants to allow airflow.

kiswahili.remedy: Tumia Ridomil Gold, dawa za kuua fangasi zenye madini ya shaba.
kiswahili.other: Hakikisha mzunguko sahihi wa mazao, epuka kumwagilia juu, na panga mimea ili kuruhusu mtiririko wa hewa.

description.english: Early blight causes dark, concentric rings on older leaves, stems, and fruits.
description.kiswahili: Madoa ya blaiti ya mapema husababisha madoa meusi yenye mistari kwenye majani, shina, na matunda ya zamani.

english.other: Remove infected plant debris, rotate crops, and avoid overcrowding plants.

kiswahili.remedy: Tumia Dithane M45, dawa za kuua fangasi zenye madini ya shaba.
kiswahili.other: Ondoa mabaki ya mimea iliyoambukizwa, panda kwa mzunguko, na epuka msongamano wa mimea.

description.english: Late blight causes large, water-soaked lesions on leaves, stems, and fruits.
description.kiswahili: Blaiti ya mwishoni husababisha madoa makubwa, yenye unyevunyevu kwenye majani, shina, na matunda.

english.remedy: Use Ridomil Gold, Fungicides such as Curzate.
english.other: Destroy infected plants, apply mulch, and monitor weather conditions for disease spread.

kiswahili.remedy: Tumia Ridomil Gold, dawa za kuua fangasi kama vile Curzate.
kiswahili.other: Haribu mimea iliyoathirika, weka matandazo, na fuatilia hali ya hewa ili kudhibiti kuenea kwa ugonjwa.

description.english: Leaf mold causes pale yellow spots on the upper surface of leaves and gray mold on the underside.
description.kiswahili: Kuvu ya majani husababisha madoa ya njano kwenye uso wa juu wa majani na ukungu wa kijivu chini.

english.other: Ventilate greenhouses, avoid overhead watering, and space plants properly.

kiswahili.remedy: Tumia Mancozeb, dawa za kuua fangasi zenye Chlorothalonil.
kiswahili.other: Peperusha hewa vizuri kwenye greenhouses, epuka kumwagilia juu, na panga mimea vizuri.

description.english: Septoria leaf spot causes small, circular spots with dark borders on leaves.
description.kiswahili: Doa la majani la Septoria husababisha madoa madogo, yenye mistari yenye giza kwenye majani.

english.other: Remove infected leaves, use drip irrigation, and practice crop rotation.

kiswahili.remedy: Tumia dawa za kuua fangasi zenye madini ya shaba kama Kocide 3000.
kiswahili.other: Ondoa majani yaliyoambukizwa, tumia umwagiliaji wa matone, na fanya mzunguko wa mazao.

description.english: Target spot causes small, dark lesions with concentric rings on leaves and fruits.
description.kiswahili: Madoa ya lengo husababisha vidonda vidogo, vyenye giza na mistari kwenye majani na matunda.

english.other: Control weeds around plants, ensure proper spacing, and use drip irrigation.

kiswahili.remedy: Tumia Azoxystrobin, dawa za kuua fangasi zenye Chlorothalonil.
kiswahili.other: Dhibiti magugu karibu na mimea, hakikisha nafasi nzuri, na tumia umwagiliaji wa matone.

description.english: This virus causes yellowing and curling of leaves, stunted growth, and reduced fruit production.
description.kiswahili: Virusi hivi husababisha majani kuwa ya njano na kujikunja, ukuaji duni, na uzalishaji mdogo wa matunda.

english.remedy: Control whiteflies using Imidacloprid, use insect netting.
english.other: Remove infected plants, rotate crops, and use virus-resistant tomato varieties.

kiswahili.remedy: Dhibiti inzi weupe kwa kutumia Imidacloprid, tumia wavu wa kuzuia wadudu.
kiswahili.other: Ondoa mimea iliyoambukizwa, panda kwa mzunguko, na tumia aina za nyanya zinazostahimili virusi.

description.english: Mosaic virus causes mottled yellow and green patches on leaves, with stunted growth.
description.kiswahili: Virusi vya mosai husababisha madoa ya njano na kijani kwenye majani, na ukuaji duni.

english.remedy: No chemical treatment; use resistant varieties and remove infected plants.
english.other: Sanitize tools, avoid handling plants when wet, and rotate crops.

kiswahili.remedy: Hakuna tiba ya kemikali; tumia aina zinazostahimili na ondoa mimea iliyoambukizwa.
kiswahili.other: Safisha zana, epuka kugusa mimea ukiwa umelowa, na panda kwa mzunguko.
